title: LeBron James, MLB, home runs, and Russell Westbrook
itunes:title: LeBron James, MLB, home runs, and Russell Westbrook
description:
Colin explains why LeBron James will be great at PG and other athletes who can adapt. He addresses Justin Verlander's comments on the ball being juiced, analytics in sports, and what comes to mind when he thinks about Russell Westbrook. Guests include Stephen Jackson, John Smoltz, and George Karl.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
